subject: Order Number #SSN3863
description_text:
Hello,
My name is Matthew Kirkendall. I ordered the new plus X pedals with haptics
. The haptics came in one box but I have not received the box with the
pedals at all. I also only received the tracking number just for the box
with the haptics. I was curious if the pedals were shipped out?

Thank you so much!

conversations.body_text: 此工单已关闭并合并到工单 8123 中
